description.value:
You launch yourself on patterns woven underfoot affiliated with your spellcraft, carrying you away to safety; it could take various forms such as a smudge of ink or paint, or rapid exclamations of text. You expend your ephemeral catalyst and Stride half your speed or up to 15 feet in a straight line, whichever is farther. Move and Manipulate actions (such as to expend the catalyst) to perform this spell do not trigger reactions.

You can eschew spending an ephemeral catalyst by spending a focus point. If you do, you Stride up to your speed or up to 30 feet, whichever is farther.

Heightened (6th) When you use this spell, you can target 2 additional allies within 30 feet of you. They can freely Stride as described by this spell, but you all must move in the same direction.
